DOC.detailed_description: Title : Effects home pulmonary rehabilitation patient chronic respiratory failure nutritional depletion State art : The IRAD2 trial evaluate 3-month home intervention include education , oral supplement , exercise androgenic steroid undernourish patient chronic respiratory failure . The main objective increase six-minute walk distance 50 improvement health-related quality-of-life . Secondary end-points include reduction exacerbation rate 25 % , reduction health-related cost increase survival year follow intervention . Material method : This interventional , multi-centre , prospective , two-armed parallel , control trial conduct 200 patient . In group , `` Control '' `` Rehabilitation '' , 7 home visit schedule 3-month intervention education purpose . In `` Rehabilitation '' group , patient receive 160 mg/d oral testosterone undecanoate men , 80 mg/d woman , oral dietary supplement ( 563 kcal/d ) exercise ergometric bicycle 3 5 time week . Expected result : In event significant response intervention , trial would validate comprehensive global home-care undernourished patient chronic respiratory failure combine therapeutic education , oral supplement , androgenic substitution physical activity .
